content.body: The work on defining MessageFormat 2.0 is perhaps finally reaching a conclusion; the WG is currently [balloting](https://github.com/unicode-org/message-format-wg/issues/955) whether to consider the spec as "done", i.e. ready to pass on to the CLDR-TC, which is the body that'll (hopefully!) officially publish it as a part of next spring's CLDR/LDML release.
